definition: altering something (as a legislative act or a statement) in such a manner as to reduce its value
details:
noun
- altering something (as a legislative act or a statement) in such a manner as to reduce its value
= example: altering something (as a legislative act or a statement) in such a manner as to reduce its value
- the act of removing the bowels or viscera
= synonyms: disembowelment
- surgical removal of an organ (or the contents of an organ) from a patient
